welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Malanday, Philippines! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and stunning beauty of our city, known for its vibrant culture and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Malanday has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal primarily used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily used by Cebu Pacific and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal mainly used by regional airlines for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow and unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
